mapper.sql: a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.address, a.status, a.sort_order, a.is_parent, a.created, a.updated, IFNULL(b.id,'0') AS 'parentCategory.id', IFNULL(b.name,'/') AS 'parentCategory.name'
LEFT JOIN tb_content_category AS b ON a.parent_id = b.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_content_category AS a
WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.status = 1

SELECT
FROM tb_content_category AS a
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
WHERE a.status = 1 ORDER BY a.parent_id ASC, a.sort_order ASC

SELECT
FROM tb_content_category AS a
WHERE a.parent_id = #{parentCategory.id} AND a.status = 1 ORDER BY a.parent_id ASC, a.sort_order ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_content_category WHERE parent_id = #{parentCategory.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_content_category ( parent_id, name, address, status, sort_order, is_parent, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{parentCategory.id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{status}, #{sortOrder}, #{isParent}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_content_category SET parent_id = #{parentCategory.id}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, status = #{status}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, is_parent = #{isParent}, created = #{created}, updated = #{updated} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_content_category SET status = 0 WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_id = #{id}
